news.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
news.summary: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world. The stock is up more than 50 per cent so far this year.

news.title: Why buying Berkshire was Warren Buffett's biggest mistake
news.summary: Buffett explains why buying the company was his biggest mistake in 2010 CNBC video clip. Buffett is in his last week as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO.

news.title: Tariffs hit boots, bags and more as leather prices jump — and relief could be years away
news.summary: Leather prices are expected to continue rising in 2026 as Trump's tariffs crimple a global supply-chain. Domestic manufacturing and cattle herds are down.

news.title: Exclusive: Nvidia buying AI chip startup Groq's assets for about $20 billion in its largest deal on record
news.summary: N Nvidia is making its largest purchase ever, acquiring assets from nine-year-old chip startup Groq for about $20 billion. The move is Nvidia's first major acquisition since it bought computer maker PC maker PC makers in 2010.

news.title: Monetizers vs manufactures: How the AI market could splinter in 2026
news.summary: AI infrastructure firms are set to win from the evolution of once asset-light Big Tech firms. AI infrastructure firms will be able to compete with the likes of Google, Facebook and Apple.

news.title: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
news.summary: “I’m sick of reading how many millions everyone has,” she says. “I'm sick of seeing how many billions everyone has.”

news.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
news.summary: “Our current salary combined is $210,000,” he says. “We’re in a position of power. We’ve got to do something.”

news.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
news.summary: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive,” she said.

news.title: Groq execs to join Nvidia as part of AI-chip licensing deal
news.summary: N Nvidia has entered into a nonexclusive licensing agreement with AI-chip maker Groq. The company will acquire some of the startup’s executive team.

news.title: For investors, the real gift from Wall Street comes one day after Christmas
news.summary: Dec. 26 has historically been the most reliably positive day of the year. For the S&P 500, Dec. 26 is a good day.
